top_blockers.blocker: Observability and operations controls are underdeveloped
top_blockers.impact: Production incident detection/triage will be slow and non-deterministic, constraining safe release confidence.
fix_plan: Introduce structured JSON logging across runtime paths with correlation IDs.
Add health/readiness probes and export metrics for core simulation and CLI flows.
Define SLOs plus incident/alert runbook and enforce checks in CI/docs gates.
evidence: file:docs/appendix/PRODUCTION_ROADMAP.md#L156-L164: structured logging still marked TODO
cmd:rg -n "prometheus|opentelemetry|alert" src/bnsyn docs: no concrete production telemetry implementation evidence

top_blockers.blocker: Security gate is not fully runnable in local deterministic environment
top_blockers.impact: Developers cannot reliably reproduce secret-scan security checks before merge, increasing late-stage failures and risk leakage.
fix_plan: Pin and vendor/auto-install gitleaks in dev setup and CI parity scripts.
Add preflight check that fails fast with install guidance if security tools are absent.
Track vulnerability remediation SLA for pip-audit findings.
evidence: cmd:make security: gitleaks: No such file or directory
cmd:pip-audit --desc: Found 1 known vulnerability in 1 package

top_blockers.blocker: Lint gate currently fails at HEAD
top_blockers.impact: Quality gate instability blocks release cadence and weakens trust in static analysis guardrails.
fix_plan: Resolve ruff violations in scripts/* and enforce no-warning baseline.
Add quick pre-commit CI parity command to prevent repeat drift.
Keep reusable quality workflow as branch protection required check.
evidence: cmd:make lint: F401/E402 failures in scripts/check_quickstart_consistency.py and scripts/math_validate.py
file:.github/workflows/_reusable_quality.yml#L22-L89: lint errors are CI-fatal

exec_summary: Readiness is 66% (confidence: medium). Biggest blockers are weak observability/ops evidence, non-reproducible local security gate execution (missing gitleaks plus pip-audit finding), and current lint failures at HEAD. Fastest +15 path: (1) implement structured logging + health/metrics baseline with runbook and CI validation, (2) make security tooling self-installing and enforce clean local security run, (3) clear ruff violations and lock zero-warning static checks. Build, tests, coverage, and release automation are strong and mostly deterministic, but production-grade operations evidence is insufficient.
